hero.title: Websites
hero.blurb:
I love building websites! Maybe too much...
Check out my recent work below.

sites.alt: Adrianne Pieczonka featured on a special set of stamps issued by Canada Post honouring opera in Canada and the 50th anniversary of the first production of the opera Louis Riel.
sites.title: Adrianne Pieczonka
sites.blurb: I worked with internationally-celebrated soprano Adrianne Pieczonka to create a bold, modern design to showcase her performances.

sites.alt: Portrait of Canadian film and theatre director Atom Egoyan
sites.title: Ego Film Arts
sites.blurb: It was time for a new look. I worked together with Canadian film and stage director Atom Egoyan to create a minimal, clean website design for Ego Film Arts.

sites.alt: Portrait of Canadian tenor Adam Luther
sites.title: Adam Luther
sites.blurb: Adam was ready for an updated website. We created a stark, modern look that reflects the drama of this opera singer's live performances.

sites.alt: Portrait of Canadian soprano Laura Albino
sites.title: Laura Albino
sites.blurb: Laura is an opera singer who wanted a new website to accompany her European audition tour. Together, we created a fresh, vibrant design to highlight her portfolio.

sites.alt: Portrait of Canadian soprano Ileana Montalbetti
sites.title: Ileana Montalbetti
sites.blurb: Ileana is a fabulous opera singer who was ready for a new website. We worked together to create an elegant design that reflects the beauty of this artistâ€™s work.

sites.title: Coffeeshop Creative
sites.blurb: I've also partnered with designer Stephen Bell of Coffeeshop Creative to build sites for John Greer, Riccardo Iannello, Hit & Run Dance Productions, Alon Nashman, Theaturtle, Extension Method, DG Volo & Company, WSB Massage, Stephanie Tritchew and Kristina Agur.
